manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Q: Is this product authentic (genuine)? If you purchase from Wishtrend, yes. This is an authentic product. We, Wishtrend assure the authenticity of the product. Not only we are an official seller on Amazon but also, we are the brand owner of Klairs. We promise to provide only genuine products to our customers.

Essential oil free toner for those who sensitive to scents Scent-Free: No redness, no irritationHydrating but gentle enoughPrep your skin: It helps other skincare products absorb into the skin to their fullestClean ingredients: No alcohol, no fragrance, no harmful ingredients

Version II, The Supple Preparation Unscented Toner. Lipidure-PMB a moisturizing agent that has been newly added in addition to hyaluronic acid and beta-glucan, is classified as a fourth generation moisturizing agent because it has higher moisture retention than beta-glucan. The toner has 20% increase in duration of moisture retention.

Version II, The Supple Preparation Unscented Toner. The unscented toner is the second version of the Original toner that excluded all essential oil, which makes it scent-free. While the original toner contains non-irritating all natural essential oil, the unscented was made to provide an option for customers’ preference for scents. 1) We recommend the unscented toner to people who are sensitive to scent. 2) We recommend the original toner to people who like the natural oil scent.

​How to use After cleansing, apply the toner to clean skin. Pat with palms for complete absorption. *Multiple application is recommended for dry areas. Tip Try the Klairs Toner & the Unscented Toner with Klairs Toner Mate 2-in-1 Cotton Pads. It is specifically created to maximize the toner’s effect by providing two types - compressed and sponged Ingredients Water, Butylene Glycol, Dimethyl Sulfone, Betaine, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Natto Gum, Sodium Hyaluronate, Disodium EDTA, Centella Asiatica Extract, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Polyquaternium-51, Chlorphenesin, Tocopheryl Acetate, Carbomer, Panthenol, Arginine, Luffa Cylindrica Fruit/Leaf/Stem Extract, Beta-Glucan, Althaea Rosea Flower Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Portulaca, Oleracea Extract, Lysine HCL, Proline, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Acetyl Methionine, Theanine, Copper Tripeptide-1

PLEASE READ We want to inform you of a temporary change in the Supple Preparation Unscented Toner upon purchasing. Klairs decided to change the *injection molding process to minimize wasted plastic during the production and at the same time to product containers of better quality. The first product created through this new production method is the Unscented Toner (LOT No. NN05, NN06). As you can see in the picture above, while modifying and developing the injection process, the color of the container came to have a yellowish hue. Other than the color of the container, the contents are identical to the original. With consideration, we came to a conclusion not to dispose of these containers since that would be against Klairs’ mottos of sustainable. We are donating 500 won (approx. 40 cents) per each bottle of the Unscented Toner sold, to both domestic and international environment-related organizations.

Supple Preparation Facial Toner Supple Unscented Toner Rich Moist Soothing Serum Daily Skin Hydrating Water Rich Moist Soothing Mask Daily Skin Softening Water Key Factor With essential oil No essential oil Moisurizing 500ml Big Size Soft tencel sheet mask 500ml Big Size

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Step 2 and 5 Star Product at “Beauty Store”
reviews.reviewText: I am not a “influencer“ because I prefer to work after obtaining three master degrees in business. But what I do know is how to make your face stay as wrinkle-free, moisturized, with no redness or irritation. I do understand that many facial products are very expensive. And believe me, I have tried many different products including a few $500 moisturizers but it is not better than a lot that are approximately $15 . In fact, one of the $500 moisturizers burnt my face and I had to go to a dermatologist to get a topical steroid cream and use it three times a day on my face. I know you can watch tons of YouTube videos or these so-called “influencers “who are getting paid for you to use their suggested products. My advice is free and I have spoken with many of my friends, 3 who are dermatologists, regarding my regime. If you follow the steps, everything I stated in the beginning will be true. First, no matter if you just got out of the shower and didn’t exfoliate your face, you will still have leftover make up or not a perfectly clean pallet to start with. First purchase 100% cotton exfoliating pads that are double sided. One side will be a bit rougher and other side will be smooth. Very inexpensive to find. If you don’t want to buy facial cloths that are already have the make-up remover that’s fine because they are expensive and you can do it so much less and expensive my way. Take the soft side of the pad to clean your face. Molecular cleaning water is fabulous and inexpensive. Use the pad from your forehead to your chin in a circular motion. Next, don’t forget about your neck. Always wipe up and not in a circular motion because gravity will pull your skin down especially around your neck and if you are on the thinner side. The thinner you are, the more wrinkles and loose skin will show as you get older. It’s a catch-22 for us women. Let’s have the perfect body yet in maintaining that, our faces will age more noticeably. Once you have used the soft side, turn the pad around and do the exact same thing with the exfoliating side. You will be surprised to see how much make-up is still on your face even after you shower. Next comes toner. I am a diamond member at a “beauty store “but Amazon sells these products at a much better price point. I strongly suggest using Klair’s Supple Saturation Non-Scented Toner. It sells out quite often at the beauty store because it is a five star product with over 3000 reviews. On Amazon, I believe it’s only $21 or so. This will be the most expensive product I am telling you to use. Take another round pad and use the soft side. The Claire’s comes out differently from other brands, say Thayers Toner, as it slowly drips from the bottle. I drip four drops on my forehead, three on each side of my cheek, one of my nose, three on my lower face near my chin, two above my top lip and two on my neck. Gently, once again in a circular motion, spread the toner across your face and sweep up boards at the neck area. Your face is now ready for the remaining products. Next I use a retinol product the one I’m suggesting is fabulous and is very inexpensive. 1HEROLABS Extreme Retinol Serum. it comes out in a tube and I put four drops on my forehead,three on each cheek, one on my nose, three on my chin, one on my upper lip and lastly, two on my neck. Rub it into your face gently with using your pointer finger. My next to last step is COURX Snail Musin. I usually use four drops on my forehead, three drops on each cheek, one on my nose, one on my upper lip, two on my chin and two on my neck. Once again, using your pointer finger, rub it in now this is the last thing that I do good old Vaseline. What it does is hold the moisturizers and products onto your face while you sleep I use a tiny bit on my forehead and around my mouth And chin area. This may sound like it would takes hours but it doesn’t. 10 minutes at the most and you will have fabulous skin! Total cost under $50 and all products can be bought at Amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Es super hidratante, especial para pieles sensibles, calmante, no tiene fragancias, no es grasoso, se seca muy rápido en la piel, es perfecto.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have dry, super sensitive skin with many product allergies, some occasional rosacea flare ups, and the occasional perioral dermatitis… but this is just wonderful! I put it on a damp face and it just soaks in (multiple layers) & followed by a moisturizer I don’t even need a super heavy moisturizer like I normally would!!!! Doesn’t make my face sticky or anything, and wears well under makeup! This is my second bottle and my face feels so amazing and not irritated for once!!!! I’ll even put on my legs after I shave sometimes before a moisturizer and this never stings or feels weird with any other combos of products 😌 GET IT!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It's okay, but not as good as others.
reviews.reviewText: I ran out of my Acwell licorice toner and wanted to try this product, as it's highly recommended. It's not really a substitute for the Acwell toner, as it feels more like a thick essence than a toner. You definitely put this on with your palms and not pads, and it doesn't make your skin feel fresh and prepped. It does make my skin the slightest bit irritated when I use it, but it's not terrible. I don't find myself reaching for it after cleansing like I always did with the Acwell, which means I wouldn't buy this again. I like the idea, though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Holy Grail of Toners
reviews.reviewText: This is arguably the greatest toner created, or at least within my testing pool of products I've tried. Incredibly gentle, moisturizing, non-irritating, no smell, no shoddy ingredients (fragrance, alcohol, parabens, whatever else). Just a toner that works. Sometimes I'll put multiple layers on to speed up pH balancing my skin. Either way, it is great for post-cleansing to balance the pH level on your skin, restore your moisture barrier and prepare for a moisturizer. This is one of the only skincare products that I think I could actually rate 11/10 and use the rest of my life if they never change the formula. The regular scented one is great too, but I prefer no fragrances.Yes, it really is that good.PS: If you are skeptical about purchasing skincare products from Amazon, buy on YesStyle for authenticity.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it honestly.
reviews.reviewText: I love this toner. It has made my skin super nice and soft. Its purpose is to prepare the skin for other products that will go on top of it and I think it does a good job of that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What I wanted at the right price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars my main moisturizer
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using this for a few years, and it’s such a great gentle moisturizer. I tried the original scented one and it irritated my skin. But this stuff just leaves my skin hydrated and happy. Sometimes I even use it on my legs if they are extra dry.

reviews.reviewTitle: a must in a skincare routine
reviews.reviewText: This is probably like the 20th time I've purchased this toner. Im absolutely obsessed! One of my holy grails because I can't get the same hydration from other products, and if you layer this toner it doesn't leave a sticky texture. I don't prefer one over the other but I know the fragrance free version is better for aging skin. For the size u also get quite a bit to last u for awhile, but personally for me, itll last maybe 2 months tops and I'll have to grab another bottle.
Not sure how watered down this formula is, but super runny & had NO impact on my skin. Wouldn’t buy again.
I loved the texture of the product. very light on skin. Feels refreshing and smells really nice.

Es la primera vez que uso este tónico y después de unas semanas estoy encantada.Si bien tras echarlo y absorberse deja la piel un poco tirante es la mejor base para los posteriores productos y desde que lo uso noto la piel mucho más jugosa y con menos granitos e imperfecciones.Muy recomendable
Questo toner è veramente favoloso e perfetto per chi ha la pelle secca e sensibile. Super idratante e senza odore cosi da non irritare la pelle. Super consigliato!
